ComicInfo.Title: Where Is Your Secret Place?; Ultra Realistic Motor Motoring Sets; What Do TV Characters Do After the Show Is Over; Sports Go Show Biz; Cracked Cracks; Architecture by Frank Wrong Lloyd; Status Symbols; Famous Scenes from Great Broadway Movies; People Who Get on Our Nerves; Today Is Monday; Cracked Takes a Look at 1897; Report Cards; Free Cut-Out Bonus
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Satire ad for Pan PM.
Satire of a newspaper if there was no news to report.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:50. [Issue ID 250406]
